name: Geneforge 4: Rebellion
description: Geneforge 4: Rebellion is an Indie fantasy role-playing adventure, the fourth chapter of the Geneforge Saga. Once again, return to the world of the Shapers, where you will explore a vast world, choose what side you will fight for, and create and mold your own army of strange, powerful monsters.
minimum_requirements: Operating system:Windows® XP / Vista™ / Windows® 7 Processor:1.6 GHz CPUMemory:512 MB Hard disk space:300MB Video: OpenGL compliant graphics cardSound:Sound card

reviews.review_text: An old isometric RPG involving a society built around a special type of magic known as 'shaping', which allows the practitioner to create and alter living beings.
